title: Sync Phone App Contacts with Contacts App
content:
I spent a lot of time cleaning up my contacts list after switching to my new Pixel 5. I've whittled it down to a nice/clean 60 people.

However the phone app doesn't seem to resync after I've made these changes and there are hundreds of contacts in that list.

How do I force it to refresh?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
